mapper.select: SELECT C.NO ,C.ADMIN_NO ,C.MEMBER_NO ,C.ENROLL_DATE ,C.CONFIRM_DATE ,C.UNIQUE_NUM ,C.IMG ,C.NAME FROM CAR C WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{no}

SELECT C.NO ,C.ADMIN_NO ,C.MEMBER_NO ,C.ENROLL_DATE ,C.CONFIRM_DATE ,C.UNIQUE_NUM ,C.IMG ,C.NAME ,M.NAME AS MEMBER_NAME ,M.PHONE AS PHONE ,A.NAME AS ADMIN_NAME FROM CAR C JOIN MEMBER M ON(M.NO = C.MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN ADMIN A ON(A.NO = C.ADMIN_NO)

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ${kinda} C JOIN MEMBER M ON(M.NO = C.MEMBER_NO)
and C.UNIQUE_NUM LIKE '%${uniqueNum}%'
and M.NAME like '%${mineOwner}%'
and C.STATUS = '${status}'
SELECT C.UNIQUE_NUM ,C.IMG ,C.NAME ,C.NO FROM ${kinda} C WHERE C.NO=#{no}

SELECT C.NO ,C.ENROLL_DATE ,C.CONFIRM_DATE ,C.UNIQUE_NUM ,C.IMG ,C.NAME ,C.STATUS ,M.NAME AS MEMBER_NAME ,M.PHONE AS PHONE ,A.NAME AS ADMIN_NAME FROM ${kinda} C JOIN MEMBER M ON(M.NO = C.MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN ADMIN A ON(A.NO = C.ADMIN_NO)
AND C.UNIQUE_NUM LIKE '%${uniqueNum}%'
AND M.NAME LIKE '%${mineOwner}%'
AND C.STATUS ='${status}'
